name: Infi Islands! V.1
description:
Infi Islands! is an infinite runner game where the player has to jump from one platform to another. The player is also given a choice to take the mushroom or avoid it; the use of the mushroom is to slow down the player. But, the player also has to avoid being too slow or their jumps would be too low to reach the other platform.

Credits:
